Dear Prof. Goodwin,

I am looking to add ion species to the kinetic mechanism of GRI-mech 
so I can simulate a methane-air flame.  Is there a standard way of 
doing so?  Do I have to define positive and negative charges as new 
atoms?

Any help is appreciated.

Thank you,

Mike Papac
UC Irvine
